item.title: Countdown to New Year 2026
item.description:
Count the seconds to the New Year in any location or time zone. 
@@ -4,25 +4,25 @@
         days
       
       
-        3397
+        3396
         hours
       
       
-        203835
+        203771
         minutes
       
       
-        12230143
+        12226263
         seconds
       
     
     
until Thursday, January 1, 2026 (Raleigh time)

-    
141 days, 13 hours, 15 minutes, 43 seconds

+    
141 days, 12 hours, 11 minutes, 3 seconds

     
until Thursday, January 1, 2026 (Raleigh time)

     

       One hour wrong? Daylight Saving Time!
     

-    
Current time is Tuesday, August 12, 2025 at 11:44:17 am EDT (local time in Raleigh) 

+    
Current time is Tuesday, August 12, 2025 at 12:48:57 pm EDT (local time in Raleigh) 

     
You may need to press Reload or Refresh on your browser to update the numbers.

     
Full-Screen Countdown

     
The links below will open in a new popup window, some popup-blockers might block them from opening.
